com.orm.androrm
Interface XToManyRelation<O extends Model,T extends Model>

Type Parameters:
O - Origin type.
T - Target type.
All Superinterfaces:
Relation<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ManyToManyField, OneToManyField
public interface XToManyRelation<O extends Model,T extends Model>
extends Relation<T>

This interface has to be implemented by all relations, that point to many other instances.

Author:
Philipp Giese

Method Summary
 void add(T value)
          Adds a new value to the list of referenced models.
 void addAll(Collection<T> values)
          Adds all items of the Collection to the list of referenced models.
 int count(Context context, O origin)
          Get the number of referenced models.
 List<T> get(Context context, O origin)
          Retrieves a list of all referenced models.
 List<T> get(Context context, O origin, Limit limit)
          Same as get(Context, Model) only with a Limit parameter to slice the result.

getTarget
 

Method Detail

count

int count(Context context,
          O origin)
Get the number of referenced models.

Parameters:
context - Context of the application.
origin - Instance of the class, that is referencing.
Returns:
Number of referenced models.

get

List<T> get(Context context,
            O origin)
Retrieves a list of all referenced models.

Parameters:
context - Context of the application.
origin - Instance of the class, that is referencing.
Returns:
List of referenced model classes.

get

List<T> get(Context context,
            O origin,
            Limit limit)
Same as get(Context, Model) only with a Limit parameter to slice the result.

Parameters:
context - Context of the application.
origin - Instance of the class, that is referencing.
limit - Limit clause.
Returns:
List of referenced model classes.

add

void add(T value)
Adds a new value to the list of referenced models.

Parameters:
value - Model instance that shall be referenced.

addAll

Adds all items of the Collection to the list of referenced models.

Parameters:
